name: McDonald's
description: Best hamburger of the world! Serving billions with love and quality

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Taste the delicious chocolatey flavor of a McCafé® Hot Chocolate. Hot chocolate made with steamed whole milk, rich chocolate syrup and topped with whipped topping and chocolate drizzle

items.name: Hot Tea
items.description: McDonald's Hot Tea has a robust black tea flavor with hints of floral and orange notes

items.name: Coca-Cola®
items.description: Coca-Cola is a refreshing McDonald's soda option that complements all of your menu favorites

items.name: Sprite®
items.description: Sprite is a delicious lemon-lime fountain drink

items.name: Dr Pepper®
items.description: McDonald's serves Dr Pepper, the classic and refreshing fountain drink with a unique blend of 23 flavors

items.name: Diet Coke
items.description: Try an icy cold Diet Coke®, with zero calories.

items.name: Fanta® Orange
items.description: McDonald’s Fanta Orange is a caffeine-free soft drink full of bubbly, refreshing orange flavor

items.name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
items.description: The McCafé® Strawberry Banana Smoothie recipe features the perfect combination of fruit purees and fruit juices, such as strawberry and banana, blended with creamy low fat yogurt and ice

items.name: Mango Pineapple Smoothie
items.description: The McDonald’s Mango Pineapple Smoothie recipe features the sweet combination of fruit juices and purees such as mango and pineapple, blended with creamy low fat yogurt and ice

items.name: Bacon, Egg & Cheese Biscuit
items.description: The McDonald's Bacon, Egg & Cheese Biscuit breakfast sandwich features a warm, buttermilk biscuit brushed with real butter, thick cut Applewood smoked bacon, a fluffy folded egg, and a slice of melty American cheese

items.name: Egg McMuffin®
items.description: Our Egg McMuffin® breakfast sandwich is an excellent source of protein and oh so delicious. We place a freshly cracked Grade A egg on a toasted English Muffin topped with real butter and add lean Canadian bacon and melty American cheese

items.name: Sausage McMuffin®
items.description: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin® recipe features a warm, freshly toasted English muffin, topped with a savory hot sausage patty and a slice of melty American cheese

items.name: Sausage McMuffin with Egg®
items.description: McDonald’s Sausage McMuffin® with Egg features a savory hot sausage, a slice of melty American cheese, and a delicious freshly cracked egg all on a freshly toasted English muffin

items.name: Sausage Biscuit®
items.description: McDonald’s Sausage Biscuit is the perfect sausage breakfast sandwich, made with sizzling hot sausage on a warm buttermilk biscuit that’s topped with real butter and baked to perfection

items.name: Sausage, Egg & Cheese McGriddles
items.description: Sausage, Egg & Cheese McGriddles® feature soft, warm griddle cakes—with the sweet taste of maple—that hold a fluffy folded egg, savory sausage, and melty American cheese.

items.name: Hamburger Happy Meal®
items.description: Hamburger, World Famous Fries® (Kids), 1% Low Fat Milk Jug, Apple Slices

items.name: 4 Piece Chicken McNuggets® Happy Meal
items.description: Hamburger, World Famous Fries® (Kids), 1% Low Fat Milk Jug, Apple Slices

items.name: 6 Piece Chicken McNuggets® Happy Meal
items.description: 6 Piece Chicken McNuggets® (6 piece), World Famous Fries® (Kids), 1% Low Fat Milk Jug, Apple Slices

items.name: Big Mac®
items.description: Mouthwatering perfection starts with two 100% pure beef patties and Big Mac® sauce sandwiched between a sesame seed bun. It’s topped off with pickles, crisp shredded lettuce, finely chopped onion and American cheese for a 100% beef burger with a taste like no other

items.name: Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese
items.description: Each Quarter Pounder® with Cheese burger features a ¼ lb.* of 100% fresh beef that’s hot, deliciously juicy and cooked when you order. It’s seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper, sizzled on a flat iron grill, then topped with slivered onions, tangy pickles and two slices of melty American cheese on a sesame seed bun

items.name: Double Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese
items.description: Each Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese features two quarter pound* 100% fresh beef burger patties that are hot, deliciously juicy and cooked when you order. McDonald’s beef patties are seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper, sizzled on a flat iron grill, then topped with slivered onions, tangy pickles and two slices of melty cheese on a sesame seed bun

items.name: Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese Deluxe
items.description: McDonald's Quarter Pounder® with Cheese Deluxe is a fresh take on a Quarter Pounder® classic burger. Crisp shredded lettuce and three Roma tomato slices top a ¼ lb.* of 100% McDonald’s fresh beef that’s hot, deliciously juicy and cooked when you order. Seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper and sizzled on our flat iron grill. Layered with two slices of melty American cheese, creamy mayo, slivered onions and tangy pickles on a soft, fluffy sesame seed hamburger bun

items.name: McDouble®
items.description: The classic McDouble® burger stacks two 100% pure beef patties seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper. Wondering what the difference is between a McDouble® and a Double Cheeseburger? A slice of cheese! It’s topped with tangy pickles, chopped onions, ketchup, mustard and a melty slice of American cheese

items.name: Hamburger
items.description: The original burger starts with a 100% pure beef burger seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper. Then, the McDonald’s burger is topped with a tangy pickle, chopped onions, ketchup and mustard

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: Our simple, classic cheeseburger begins with a 100% pure beef burger seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper. The McDonald’s Cheeseburger is topped with a tangy pickle, chopped onions, ketchup, mustard, and a slice of melty American cheese

items.name: McChicken®
items.description: It’s a classic for a reason. Savor the satisfying crunch of our juicy chicken patty, topped with shredded lettuce and just the right amount of creamy mayonnaise, all served on a perfectly toasted bun

items.name: Chicken McNuggets®
items.description: Our tender, juicy Chicken McNuggets® are made with 100% white meat chicken and no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives

items.name: Filet-O-Fish®
items.description: Dive into our wild-caught Filet-O-Fish®! This McDonald’s fish sandwich has fish sourced from sustainably managed fisheries, on melty American cheese and topped with creamy McDonald’s tartar sauce, all served on a soft, steamed bun

items.name: Vanilla Cone
items.description: Enjoy our creamy vanilla soft serve in a crispy cone! It's the perfect sweet treat in addition to any McDonald's meal or on its own

items.name: McFlurry® with M&M'S® Candies
items.description: The McDonald’s M&M ® McFlurry® is a sweet, creamy M&M’S® dessert of vanilla soft serve with M&M’S® chocolate candies swirled in

items.name: Chocolate Shake
items.description: Try the McDonald’s Chocolate Shake, the perfect sweet treat for any time of the day. Our chocolate shake is made with delicious soft serve, chocolate syrup and finished off with a creamy whipped topping

items.name: Strawberry Shake
items.description: McDonald's Strawberry Shake is made with creamy vanilla soft serve, blended with strawberry syrup and topped with whipped topping

items.name: Vanilla Shake
items.description: McDonald's vanilla shake is made with our creamy vanilla soft serve and topped with whipped topping for a cool, tasty treat

items.name: Baked Apple Pie
items.description: McDonald's Baked Apple Pie recipe features 100% American-grown apples, and a lattice crust baked to perfection and topped with sprinkled sugar
